import torch
import torch.nn as nn
import torch.nn.functional as F
from noise2noise.helpers import *
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def median_filter(img, x, y, kernel_size=3):
    channel = img.size(0)
    height = img.size(1)
    width = img.size(2)
    dist = kernel_size//2
    
    from_x, to_x = max(x-dist,0), min(x+dist+1,height)
    from_y, to_y = max(y-dist,0), min(y+dist+1,height)
    
    return torch.median(img[:,from_x:to_x,from_y:to_y].reshape(channel,-1), dim=1).values

def conv_median(img, kernel_size=3):
    height = img.size(1)
    width = img.size(2)
    
    filter_img = torch.empty_like(img)
    for x in range(height):
        for y in range(width):
            filter_img[:,x,y] = median_filter(img, x, y, kernel_size=kernel_size)
    return filter_img

noisy_imgs , target_imgs = load_train('./dataset/val_data.pkl')
noisy_img = noisy_imgs[0]
target_img = target_imgs[0]
show_img(to_float_image(noisy_img))

show_img(to_float_image(filtered))
